languages.text: {n}Вы закрываете глаза и погружаетесь в бесконечность... А когда снова открываете их — дивная дорога без конца и края предстает перед вашим взором.{/n}
{n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы закрываете глаза и погружаетесь в бесконечность... А когда снова открываете их — дивная дорога без конца и края предстает перед вашим взором.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into the infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你闭上眼，沉入无限之中……你再次睁开双眼，一条看不到尽头的奇妙之路出现在你的面前。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你闭上眼，沉入无限之中……你再次睁开双眼，一条看不到尽头的奇妙之路出现在你的面前。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cierras los ojos y te zambulles en el infinito... Y cuando los vuelves a abrir, tienes ante ti un magnífico camino que se pierde en el horizonte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cierras los ojos y te zambulles en el infinito... Y cuando los vuelves a abrir, tienes ante ti un magnífico camino que se pierde en el horizonte.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux et plongez dans l'infini... Quand vous les rouvrez, vous vous trouvez sur une route magnifique qui s'étend à perte de vue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux et plongez dans l'infini... Quand vous les rouvrez, vous vous trouvez sur une route magnifique qui s'étend à perte de vue.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du schließt deine Augen und tauchst ein in die Unendlichkeit ... Und als du sie wieder öffnest, erscheint vor dir eine wunderbare Straße, die kein Ende hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du schließt deine Augen und tauchst ein in die Unendlichkeit ... Und als du sie wieder öffnest, erscheint vor dir eine wunderbare Straße, die kein Ende hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたは目を閉じ、終わりのない世界へと飛び込む。そして再び目を開けると…終わりの見えない不思議な道が目の前に現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは目を閉じ、終わりのない世界へと飛び込む。そして再び目を開けると…終わりの見えない不思議な道が目の前に現れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and dive into infinity... And when you open them again — a wondrous road with no end in sight appears before you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kapatıp sonsuzluğa dalıyorsun... Gözlerini açtığında ucu bucağı görünmeyen, harika bir yolun önünde belirdiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
